Art. 4.227. 
Registration of real properties
Dispositions by gifts or wills, subject to conservation, are, at the instance of either the encumbered person or the tutor appointed for the execution, made public; namely, in respect of immovables, by the transcription of the deeds in the register of the competent office of the Administration gnrale de la Documentation patrimoniale; and in respect of sums collocated with a lien on immovables, by registration on the property affected by the lien.
